sentences.en: Dogs were also associated with healing in the ancient world.
sentences.cn: 在古代，狗也与治病有关。

sentences.en: Each one of these ancient towns is hauntingly beautiful.
sentences.cn: 这些古镇个个都美得令人难以忘怀。

sentences.en: He also studied the ancient stone tablets from around the pyramids.
sentences.cn: 他还研究了在金字塔周围发现的古代石匾。

sentences.en: He has attracted much interest by setting ancient religious texts to music.
sentences.cn: 他因为给古老的宗教经书谱曲配乐而备受关注。

sentences.en: Lead was one of the metals known to the ancient world.
sentences.cn: 铅是早在古代就已知的金属之一。

sentences.en: Mr Dawe was the ancient, formally trained head gardener.
sentences.cn: 道先生是那种老式的、正规科班出身的首席园艺师。

sentences.en: Much of the ancient city is illuminated at night.
sentences.cn: 夜里，这个古老城市的大部分地区灯火通明。

sentences.en: Only the names are ancient; the characters are modern and contemporary.
sentences.cn: 只有姓名是古代的；人物都是现代的、摩登的。

sentences.en: She was ringing up her sale on an ancient cash register.
sentences.cn: 她正用一台老掉牙的收银机记账。

sentences.en: The core of the city is a series of ancient squares.
sentences.cn: 市中心是一座接一座古老的广场。

sentences.en: The journey ends in the ancient city of Marrakesh.
sentences.cn: 旅行的终点是马拉喀什古城。

sentences.en: The Tel, an artificial mountain, entombs Jericho's ancient past.
sentences.cn: 泰勒山作为一座人造山掩藏着杰里科过去古老的历史。

sentences.en: There are some areas of wetland which are of ancient origin.
sentences.cn: 有一些湿地在古代就形成了。

sentences.en: They believed ancient Greece and Rome were vital sources of learning.
sentences.cn: 他们认为古代希腊罗马是知识的重要发源地。

sentences.en: They held his fate in the palms of their ancient hands.
sentences.cn: 他们这些老人将他的命运掌握在手心里。

phrases.tran_cn: 西洋古代史；家喻户晓的故事
（尤指古罗马或古希腊的）古人

trans.tran_en: belonging to a time long ago in history, especially thousands of years ago
people who lived long ago, especially the Greeks and Romans
